report.title: Understanding the Medicinal Pleasure
report.author: Sandy Beaches
report.bodytext: I have been taking 20 mgs of Methadone twice a day for the past four years. /n /n I have experienced no side effects, no 'high,' no 'low,' no anything except pain relief. /n /n I have two other family members who take Methadone for pain, and neither have any side effects or 'highs.' /n /n We all receive our Methadone via prescriptions. /n /n I have found Methadone to be a safe effective pain reliever with no side effects.
